name: Spider-Man: Far From Home Virtual Reality
summary: Based on the film, the Spider-Man: Far From Home VR Experience is a fast-swinging, thrill ride through the eyes of your favorite neighborhood Spider-Man. Spider-Man: Far From Home – now available on disc and digital.
info:
• 中文名: 蜘蛛侠:英雄远征
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: VR 冒险
  • 开发商: CreateVR
  • 发行: Sony Pictures Virtual Reality
  • 发行日期: 2019年6月25日
  • 售价: 免费
